message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this incredible product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the price I'm offering. Let's get started!
I appreciate the enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we discuss a price of $8,250?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,800 for the product. Can you consider that?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $8,100? I think it's a fair price considering the value this product brings
I appreciate the concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,900 for the product. Can you consider that?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to make another small concession to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $8,050?
I appreciate the concession, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to pay $7,900 is still too high for me, but I can do $7,950. Can you consider that?
I can see you're really trying to squeeze every last dollar out of your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8,050, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer on that price point
